channel.title: Devo -- how to make it when u kill someone u get random item?!?!?!?
channel.description: T I T L E S A Y S I T A L L[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 30, 2009, 04:01:07 pm[/size][hr]cmon?

item.title: Devo -- how to make it when u kill someone u get random item?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Ill make something for you now… which devo you using? 2.7?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2009, 08:18:55 am[/size][hr]Add these in client.java under the first {

			public static int random_death_items[] = {8849,1305}; //Add more to this
				public static int randomDeathItems() {
		return random_death_items[(int) (Math.random() * random_death_items.length)];

Then search for

Oh dear you have died!

And add this under it:

client killerz2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
				killerz2.addItem(randomDeathItems(), 1);

So that bit should look like:

CAM().sendMessage("Oh dear you have died!.");
				client killerz2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
				killerz2.addItem(randomDeathItems(), 1);

And you’re done!
Haven’t tested, should work ok, you just need to add loads of items to it now

Read full topic
